CustomField.description: 1. Not integration relevant 2. ZR 3. Helper field to report on Quotes with successful Orders
CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"ABG") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "END")|| ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "AUS")|| ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "NEU")|| ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "RUN")), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Successful Order
